ComicInfo.Summary: Gary Hampton has had to endure so much pain and death since he first became the Astounding Wolf-Man - more than any man should be expected to take. Now Zechariah has his daughter and this isn't going to be pretty. This issue has an ending you won't believe - all leading to the monumental 25th issue!

ComicInfo.Title: Birth of a Hero
